E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 4/29/1983
Subject: Horacio Velazquez learns new position
Horacio Velazquez has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Centerfield.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1983
Subject: Status of Antoine Corrado
Dear Sir,
Antoine Corrado has an ERA of 5.34 at AA .
I believe he isn't ready yet for that level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1983
Subject: Status of Joseph Ward
Dear Sir,
Joseph Ward shouldn't play at AA !
He has an AVG of .227 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1983
Subject: Status of Kevin Burk
Dear Sir,
Kevin Burk has an AVG of .238 at AA !
That's definitely no good sign. I suggest demoting him soon.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 5/13/1983
Subject: Status of Henry Dickison
Dear Sir,
Henry Dickison isn't hitting the ball at all at AA !
He has an AVG of .245, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 5/20/1983
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Calvin Miller



Date: Tuesday, 5/20/1983
Subject: Status of Dante Ruvalcaba
Dear Sir,
Dante Ruvalcaba seems overmatched at AA !
He has an ERA of 8.02 over there, so I think
you should demote him.

Regards,
Scouting Director
